page.title: 11RECREATION
page.content: Much of this area is situated in the valleys of the Bournbrook and the River Rea,which has led to the valley bottoms being made available for leisure.Four zones of allotments are located in the area,three of which are alongside the River Rea.This area has both parks and open spaces.In total there are twelve parks and playing fields which include{Calthorpe Park containing play areas ,pitchers and tennis courts.{Cannon Hill Park}caters for festivals and family days out. Highbury Road with pitchers,miniature golf and running track.Sports grounds belonging to the police,Lloyds Bank and the B.B.C.There are also playing fields in the university and King Edwards School.Good facilities are found at the{Moseley Rugby Club}and the{Warwickshire County Cricket Club and{Priory Lawn Tennis Club.
